section_title: Procedures, Mechanisms and Institutional Arrangements for Appeals against Decisions of the CDM Executive Board
sentences: On Monday, 1 June, Chair Yauvoli proposed, and parties agreed to, informal consultations co-facilitated by Kunihiko Shimada (Japan) and Yaw Osafo (Ghana).
During the SBI closing plenary on Thursday, 11 June, the SBI adopted conclusions.
